column5: nicely done!
beauty fish GCD!
Beauty Fish, Love the Grin, Ear to Ear.   WTG.
See?  All you have to do is remember what I told ya.  Very nice, Glen and congratulations.  Nass whappure.

WTG Glen you see its not so bad without your boat.  90 percent of us are without our boats so now you know how we feel.  Shore fishin can be better than the boat on some days.  Now answer Roy 's Question did you use the net and did you bring a tripod?  Nice fatty hybrid
Shore fishing?  Clothing?  Clean fingers?  It's like I don't even know you!        Dang nice bass rednick!

That looks like a fun catch on light tackle Glen. Good stuff! By the way, have you figured out what is up with your engine? I may have missed an update on it. Last I heard it was possibly a fuel problem.

Not great for customer relations on their part. Another shop looks like a good option Glen. Hope you get mobile on the water soon though. You catch many more like that from shore and you wont bother to get it fixed.
Nice work GCD, those accidental videos are great. I have a few myself. That what the heck happened look, when you realize it's not taking a photo are priceless.
DANG DAWG !!!  That's some fine fish you gots dere Boy...
Great report!
....Now that there is one of them there species I needs to put on my "to catch" list (it's a long list).

Nice fish and great report Glen !!  Glen, the way you tell the difference between a striper and Hybid is ?????  I'm trying to recall from what the guys in Tennessee we fished with told us.....one has broken lines and one has solid ??
WOW, oh too be fishing again. Nice catch  Any day fishing is better than working,
Amazing wiper there dawg.  Good report to boot.  Sounds like an amzing fight on the UL.  Thanks for sharing and keep 'em coming.  reefrunner
beauty fish on ultralite to boot, way to go  see ur wearing a jacket, must of been a blistering cold day out there, 80F or so ? LOL
Super report G.  Love the pose  Joey
Good to see your still grabbing the bigguns even without the boat Glen.
DANG Glen.... looks like you should fish from shore more often !!  Great fish !
Great report and pictures as always GCD! Hope you get you boat back soon although it looks like you don't need it.
Sweet fish!  Man I wish we had those in Ontario.
Nice bass Glen !!! Wish we had spots around here like that we could just pull up too...  Cheers !!!
sweet looking wiper!
Good outing, but who operates the still when you fish?
nice report and fish
Hey I know that spot... LOL    Beauty fish, great report, WTG...
Great Report and Nice Job!
nice fish i picked up a couple of those rooster tails up last weekend gonna try them on some canadian waters lol

Wow...you really did go out fishing today!  Great stuff Glen...and that's one fine fish!  See?  Bly and I are not crazy for shore fishing....and just because we have a boat, we'll still continue to shore fish most of the time.  The boat will be for weekends....when we only have a few hours after dinner to fish, our fav shore spots is where you'll find us.  You think you'll have crowds there tomorrow now?? LOL
WTG there glen! glad to see even without a boa you can hook fish.
Thats an awesome lookin fish! especially on the UL!!!  -Ben
Loved the report Glen!  Beauty bass.  Since you have posted this,I am going to assume that you were able to spend the afternoon peacefully with no incidents!  Thanks Glen
Beauty report, Bubba. That's some fish! I need to know though, did you use a net or did you lip'em? Using a tripod for the camera, or a rock?
HEY keep the boat at home if thats what's going to happen. Awesome fish....is that a personel best on wipers?
that's a beauty from the shore! just two more months or so for us, thanks for keeping us alive for the mean time with the report
Good goin, thar GCD!  How are the Wipers fer eatin'?
Lookin' good Dawg.   When you post said "Nothin up my sleeve" .... my first thought was ... what sleeve ?
